Class Seller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Seller
  • public class Seller
extends java.lang.Object
    Seller Class

    Seller class manages the seller's ability to add a product, remove a product, or edit a product (any of its fields)

    Version:
    November 13, 2023
    Author:
    Lalitha Chandolu, Nirmal Senthilkumar; Justin CS 180 Black

      Add Product to Store Seller can add a new product to their specified store if the product doesn't currently exist
      static java.lang.String editProduct​(java.lang.String productName, java.lang.String storeName, java.lang.String changeField, java.lang.String newValue)

      static boolean exportStoreInformation​(java.lang.String merchantName, java.lang.String storeName)
      Export Store Information Allows a seller to export a csv file of the information of their store CSV contains rows of products sold in the store Each csv contains information for one of their unique stores

      List Information By Store Sellers can view a list of their sales by store, including customer information and revenues from the sale.

      Product Exists Method Returns a boolean if the product exists in the specified Seller's store
      static java.lang.String removeProduct​(java.lang.String productName, java.lang.String storeName)
      Remove Product Sellers can remove products from the current product line Given the productName and the Store name Only if the product exists; if not, no change occurs
      static java.lang.String viewStoreStatistics​(java.lang.String username, int sortChoice)
      View Store Statistics Sellers can view a dashboard that lists statistics for each of their stores.

    • Method Detail

      • removeProduct

        public static java.lang.String removeProduct​(java.lang.String productName,
                                             java.lang.String storeName)
        Remove Product Sellers can remove products from the current product line Given the productName and the Store name Only if the product exists; if not, no change occurs
        Parameters:
        productName - name of product to be removed
        storeName - name of store product to be removed from
        Returns:
        String (whether product was removed)

      • productExists

        public static boolean productExists​(java.lang.String productName,
                                    java.lang.String storeName)
        Product Exists Method Returns a boolean if the product exists in the specified Seller's store
        Parameters:
        productName - product name to be checked if it exists
        storeName - store name to be checked if product exists in it
        Returns:
        true if it exists, false if it doesn't

      • addProduct

        public static java.lang.String addProduct​(java.lang.String productName,
                                          double price,
                                          java.lang.String storeName,
                                          int quantity,
                                          java.lang.String description,
                                          java.lang.String sellerUserName)
        Add Product to Store Seller can add a new product to their specified store if the product doesn't currently exist
        Parameters:
        productName - productName field to be added
        price - price field to be added
        storeName - storeName field to be added
        quantity - quantity field to be added
        description - description field to be added
        sellerUserName - sellerUserName field to be added

      • editProduct

        public static java.lang.String editProduct​(java.lang.String productName,
                                           java.lang.String storeName,
                                           java.lang.String changeField,
                                           java.lang.String newValue)
        Edit Product in Store Seller can add a new product to their existing store
        Parameters:
        productName - name of product to be updated
        storeName - store of product to be updated
        changeField - can be the following values: "name" "price" "store" "quantity" "description"
        newValue - the value to update with

      • importStoreInformation

        public static boolean importStoreInformation​(java.lang.String username,
                                             java.lang.String pathname)
        Import Store Information Takes a pathname from the seller and imports the store information to the market.txt file
        Parameters:
        pathname - the pathname to import the store information from
        Returns:
        boolean (true if import occured; false otherwise)

      • viewStoreStatistics

        public static java.lang.String viewStoreStatistics​(java.lang.String username,
                                                   int sortChoice)
        View Store Statistics Sellers can view a dashboard that lists statistics for each of their stores. Data will include a list of customers with the number of items that they have purchased Or a list of products with the number of sales made Depending on the sortChoice that the sellers choose on their dashboard in their menu
        Parameters:
        username - (seller username)
        sortChoice - (sort by which type)
